title: Cloud Scaling Tactics for 2026
author: Maria Oto
summary: Mastering the complexities of global infrastructure scaling in a multi-cloud world.
content:
Scaling used to be about throwing more hardware at the problem. Today, it's about intelligent distribution.

## Serverless Evolution
Serverless architecture has matured, allowing for nearly infinite scaling with zero management overhead for developers.

## Global Data Consistency
New database technologies allow us to maintain high-speed access to data across the globe without sacrificing reliability.
